00024 // Constructor
00025 BdkDDalitzAmp::BdkDDalitzAmp(const char * name, 
00026                              const char * title, 
00027                              BdkDalitzBase * pdf,
00028                              Int_t componentsBit,
00029                              Int_t defaultRhoSpin) :
00030   BdkAbsDDalitzAmp(name, title, pdf, componentsBit),
00031   _defaultRhoSpin(defaultRhoSpin)
00032 {
00033   initResonance();
00034   createParams();
00035   registerParams(_pdf);
00036 }

00044 Double_t BdkDDalitzAmp::efficiency(Double_t m12, Double_t m13) const
00045 {
00046   return _pdf->efficiency(m12, m13);
00047 }

00050 // initialize the components:
00051 void BdkDDalitzAmp::initResonance() 
00052 {
00053 
00054   if (nComps()!=0) {
00055     cout << "BdkDDalitzAmp::initResonance(): Cannot call initResonance more than once!" << endl;
00056     return;
00057   }
00058   
00059   // Define all RooRealVar floating observables.
00060 
00061   /* The trackinfo variable defines the cyclycal nature of the resonances
00062      and the final state pions, with the following order. 
00063      See enum ResDaughters.
00064 
00065      index   particle
00066      1       pi0
00067      2       pi+
00068      3       pi-
00069      --------------
00070      index   resonance   dtr particles   dtr indices
00071      1       rho0        pi+ pi-         23
00072      2       rho-        pi0 pi-         13
00073      3       rho+        pi0 pi+         12
00074   */
00075 
00076   int rhoPIndex = -1;
00077   int rho2sPIndex = -1;
00078   int rho1700PIndex = -1;
00079   int nonresIndex = -1;
00080 
00081   // pi+pi0 resonances:
00082   if (RHOP & componentsBit()) {
00083     rhoPIndex = nComps();  // store its index
00084     addComp("Rho+", 1.0, 0.0, 0.7758, 0.1503, PI0_PIP, _defaultRhoSpin);
00085   }
00086 
00087   if (RHO2SP & componentsBit()) {
00088     rho2sPIndex = nComps(); // store its index
00089     addComp("Rho2s+", 0.0, 0.0, 1.465, 0.400, PI0_PIP, _defaultRhoSpin);
00090   }
00091 
00092   if (RHO1700P & componentsBit()) {
00093     rho1700PIndex = nComps(); // store its index
00094     addComp("Rho1700+", 0.0, 0.0, 1.720, 0.250, PI0_PIP, _defaultRhoSpin);
00095   }
00096 
00097   // pi+pi- resonances:
00098   if (RHO0 & componentsBit()) {
00099     addComp("Rho0", 0.59, 10.0, 0.7758, 0.1503, PIP_PIM, _defaultRhoSpin, 
00100             rhoPIndex);
00101   }
00102 
00103   if (RHO2S0 & componentsBit()) {
00104     addComp("Rho2s0", 0.0, 0.0, 1.465, 0.400, PIP_PIM, _defaultRhoSpin,
00105             rho2sPIndex);
00106   }
00107 
00108   if (RHO17000 & componentsBit()) {
00109     addComp("Rho17000", 0.0, 0.0, 1.720, 0.250, PIP_PIM, _defaultRhoSpin,
00110             rho1700PIndex);
00111   }
00112 
00113   if (SIGMA & componentsBit()) {
00114     addComp("Sigma", 0.0, 0.0, 0.500, 0.400, PIP_PIM, SPIN0);
00115   }
00116 
00117   if (OMEGA & componentsBit()) {
00118     addComp("Omega", 0.0, 0.0, 0.78268, 0.00849, PIP_PIM, SPIN1);
00119   }
00120 
00121   if (F0 & componentsBit()) {
00122     addComp("F0", 0.0, 0.0, 0.980, 0.044, PIP_PIM, SPIN0);
00123 
00124     // width for the F0 is taken from PRL 86, 765 (E791, 2001).
00125     // which looked at Ds->pi+pi-pi+
00126   }
00127 
00128   if (F0_1370 & componentsBit()) {
00129     addComp("F0_1370", 0.0, 0.0, 1.434, 0.173, PIP_PIM, SPIN0);
00130 
00131     // parameters for the F0_1370 are taken from PRL 86, 765 (E791, 2001).
00132     // which looked at Ds->pi+pi-pi+
00133   }
00134 
00135   if (F0_1500 & componentsBit()) {
00136     addComp("F0_1500", 0.0, 0.0, 1.507, 0.109, PIP_PIM, SPIN0);
00137   }
00138 
00139   if (F0_1710 & componentsBit()) {
00140     addComp("F0_1710", 0.0, 0.0, 1.714, 0.140, PIP_PIM, SPIN0);
00141   }
00142 
00143   if (F2 & componentsBit()) {
00144     addComp("F2", 0.0, 0.0, 1.2754, 0.1851, PIP_PIM, SPIN2);
00145   }
00146 
00147   if (F2P1525 & componentsBit()) {
00148     addComp("F2P1525", 0.0, 0.0, 1.525, 0.073, PIP_PIM, SPIN2);
00149   }
00150 
00151   // pi-pi0 resonances:
00152   if (RHOM & componentsBit()) {
00153     addComp("Rho-", 0.65, -4.0, 0.7758, 0.1503, PIM_PI0, _defaultRhoSpin,
00154             rhoPIndex);
00155   }
00156 
00157   if (RHO2SM & componentsBit()) {
00158     addComp("Rho2s-", 0.0, 0.0, 1.465, 0.400, PIM_PI0, _defaultRhoSpin,
00159             rho2sPIndex);
00160   }
00161 
00162   if (RHO1700M & componentsBit()) {
00163     addComp("Rho1700-", 0.0, 0.0, 1.720, 0.250, PIM_PI0, _defaultRhoSpin,
00164             rho1700PIndex);
00165   }
00166 
00167   if (NONRES & componentsBit()) {
00168     nonresIndex = nComps();  // store its index
00169     addComp("Nonres", 1.03, 77, 0, 0, PIP_PIM_PI0, SPIN0);
00170   }
00171  
00172   if (NRPW_PM & componentsBit()) {
00173     addComp("NRPW_PM", 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, PIP_PIM, SPIN1, nonresIndex);
00174   }
00175  
00176   if (NRPW_M0 & componentsBit()) {
00177     addComp("NRPW_M0", 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, PIM_PI0, SPIN1, nonresIndex);
00178   }
00179  
00180   if (NRPW_0P & componentsBit()) {
00181     addComp("NRPW_0P", 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, PI0_PIP, SPIN1, nonresIndex);
00182   }
00183  
00184   // Masses of the above daughters
00185   _mDaug[0] = 0.0;
00186   _mDaug[1] = BdkDalitz::PI0MASS;
00187   _mDaug[2] = BdkDalitz::PIMASS;
00188   _mDaug[3] = BdkDalitz::PIMASS;  
00189 }
